stories.text:
Hey, I work for an all-remote startup company.

We are based in Canada, but have team members abroad, namely in the UK, Poland, and now most recently Brazil.

We use Apple machines, but we've found that shipping company-owned work laptops to our team members abroad is troublesome.

The Apple Store (not even with a Business Account) cannot do this.

Note that we'd want to ship people the machines with the appropriate power adapter and keyboard localization, so just buying them locally and shipping them there isn't going to do the job either.

(I am well aware that this is almost certainly less of an issue with Thinkpad and Dell, but our product is Apple-specific and switching is not feasible.)

Perhaps some kind of global reseller?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to ship company laptops to remote team members abroad?
